scripts.build-release: npm run compile:scss && npm run compile:ts && npm run bundle
scripts.build-debug: npm run compile:scss && npm run compile:ts
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css && npm run bundle:js
scripts.postcss: npm run compile:scss && postcss wwwroot/css/style.css -o wwwroot/css/style.css
scripts.bundle:css: npm run compile:scss && postcss wwwroot/css/style.css | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/style.min.css
scripts.bundle:js: npm run compile:ts && uglifyjs -o wwwroot/scripts/app.js -c -m -- wwwroot/scripts/app.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:scss | npm run watch:ts
scripts.watch:scss: npm run compile:scss && npm run compile:scss -- -w
